cause.description:
HOPE for AIDS (www.hopeforaids.org) is a ministry of SIM (Serving In Mission, www.sim.org). Our response to the AIDS crisis is HOPE: • Home-based care • Orphan care • Prevention • Enabling the Church to respond
Keep hope alive.
1. Home-based care
2. Orphan care
3. Prevention
4. Enabling the Church to respond
cause.mission: We are an HIV&AIDS relief cooperative with supported programs throughout Africa and India. We're working with our national partners to keep hope alive in the aftermath of the HIV&AIDS pandemic.
cause.name: HOPE for AIDS
